name: ASDAD: All-Stars Dungeons and Diamonds
description: Compete against a friend in an exhilarating diamond-collecting race where quick and strategic thinking and good maze-navigation skills are key to outmatch your opponent and emerge victorious!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or better Processor: Core i3 2.6 Ghz or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or similar
